meanings.definition: The concluding section of a piece of music or video.
meanings.sent1: After the song ended, the outros played softly in the background.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the outros of my favorite movies.
meanings.sent3: The outros of the film decided to throw a surprise party for the main characters.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were like the outros of a symphony, graceful and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The outros of the video were so emotional, they brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'outro', meaning the final part of a piece of music or video.
meanings.sent1: The collection of outros in this album is truly impressive.
meanings.sent2: Let's watch all the outros of these music videos together.
meanings.sent3: The outros of the songs gathered for a group photo at the end of the concert.
meanings.sent4: The variety of outros in this playlist is like a colorful bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent5: She carefully studied the outros of famous films to learn more about storytelling.

meanings.definition: The third person singular form of the verb 'outro', meaning to surpass or outdo someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He always outros his opponents in every competition.
meanings.sent2: She strives to outros her previous achievements with each new project.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to outros the dog in a race around the backyard.
meanings.sent4: His determination to outros his own limits is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's goal is to outros the world record in the upcoming tournament.
